Uses of Class
evs.data.PairedData

Packages that use PairedData
evs.analysisunits Store of classes for specifying Verification Units (VUs) and Aggregation Units (AUs). 
evs.data Classes for I/O on forecasts, observations and verification pairs. 
evs.data.fileio Classes for file I/O. 
evs.metric.metrics Verification metrics for the ensemble mean and (ensemble-derived) forecast probabilities. 
 

Uses of PairedData in evs.analysisunits
 

Methods in evs.analysisunits that return PairedData
 PairedData VerificationUnit.getConditionedPairs(boolean applyValCond)
          Applies any conditions associated with the current verification unit to the verification pairs and returns the reduced set of pairs that satisfy those conditions.
 PairedData VerificationUnit.getPairs()
          Returns a set of paired observations and forecasts associated with the current verification unit or throws an exception if no paired data source has been defined or is otherwise unreadable.
 

Uses of PairedData in evs.data
 

Methods in evs.data that return PairedData
static PairedData[] PairedDataSource.computeAndSetPairs(VerificationUnit[] units)
          Convenience method for setting pairs for a set of verification units.
 PairedData PairedDataSource.getPairedData(boolean eliminateDuplicates, double nV)
          Returns a paired dataset from the source or throws an exception if the source could not be processed.
static PairedData PairedData.getPooledPairs(PairedData[] pairs, boolean eliminateDuplicates)
          Merges the input data and returns a new pooled dataset.
static PairedData SyntheticPairs.getSyntheticPairs(java.util.Calendar start, java.util.Calendar end, int tStep, int lead, int eCount, double pMean, double pSpread, double obsSpread, double forcBias, double forcSpread, double rho, double nV)
          Returns some synthetic, normally distributed, correlated pairs according to the inputs.
 

Methods in evs.data with parameters of type PairedData
static PairedData PairedData.getPooledPairs(PairedData[] pairs, boolean eliminateDuplicates)
          Merges the input data and returns a new pooled dataset.
static DoubleMatrix1D PairedData.getUnionOfLeadTimes(PairedData[] pairs)
          Returns the union of lead times in the input.
static void PairedDataSource.readAndSetClimatology(VerificationUnit vu, PairedData pairs, DataSource climatology)
          Sets the climatological observations for an existing paired dataset if they have been requested and do not exist.
protected static void SyntheticPairs.writeSyntheticPairs(java.io.File file, PairedData data, double nV)
          Supports writing of datacard output files from a set of synthetically generated paired data.
 

Uses of PairedData in evs.data.fileio
 

Methods in evs.data.fileio that return PairedData
static PairedData PairedFileIO.read(java.io.File pairedFile, IOState ioState, boolean eliminateDuplicates, double nV)
          Reads a file containing paired data and returns a paired dataset.
static PairedData PairedFileIO.read(java.io.File pairedFile, IOState ioState, double nV)
          Reads a file containing paired data and returns a paired dataset.
static PairedData PairedFileIO.readASCIIPairs(java.io.File pairedFile, java.lang.String valDelims, java.util.TimeZone timeZone, boolean eliminateDuplicates, int skipRows, double nV)
          Reads a text file containing paired data where each row contains the forecast date (month, day, year, hour), lead time, observation and ensemble members.
static PairedData PairedFileIO.readText(java.io.File pairedFile, java.lang.String valDelims, double nV)
          Reads a text file containing paired data where each row contains the forecast date (month, day, year, hour), lead time, observation and ensemble members.
static PairedData PairedFileIO.readText(java.io.File pairedFile, java.lang.String valDelims, java.util.TimeZone timeZone, boolean removeDuplicates, int skipRows, double nV)
          Reads a text file containing paired data where each row contains the forecast date (month, day, year, hour), lead time, observation and ensemble members.
 

Methods in evs.data.fileio with parameters of type PairedData
static void PairedFileIO.write(java.io.File pairedFile, PairedData pairs, boolean stripNulls, int precision, IOState ioState, double nV)
          Writes the specified paired data to a specified file.
static void PairedFileIO.writeASCIIPairs(PairedData pairs, java.io.File output, java.lang.String sep)
          Writes a flat text format file from a paired dataset where each row comprises the forecast date and time, the forecast lead time, the observation, and the ensemble members.
